attributes.action: Make politicians pay for their meals instead of milking UK tax payers
attributes.background: Why should politicians get free food? The average tax payer struggles to pay their bills each month, works extra hours & gets nothing for free, why should politicians be any different, it's just pure greed. Milking the system with expenses & freebies stop taking the pee out of us

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/256302

The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the rules on MPs' expenses. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
